item.description: The meaning of the tags #LI-Remote: Remote #LI-Hybrid: Hybrid #LI-Onsite: Onsite #LI-DNI: To prevent jobs from displaying on LinkedIn completely. (DNI = Do Not Ingest) #LI-DNP: To prevent jobs from filling a job slot, use this tag or use the ‘block job’ functionality. – https://www.reddit.com/r/AskHR/comments/ifrayb/what_does_liremote_in_a_job_description_mean/
